description.name: description
description.value:

value.name: Zend_Controller
value.description: front controller, including router and dispatcher

value.body:
@Arulmozhi

Please provides more information the problem that happens in Zend_Validate_EmailAddress.
Report input of Zend_Validate_EmailAddress and the what you try validate.

Thanks advance.

Cannot Reproduce by missing information, case are provides information aditional reopened issue.

Greetings,
Ramon Henrique
